qas.question: What is Machine learning closely related to?
What type of compressor can be used for prediction?
What has been used as a benchmark for "general intelligence"?
What type of compressor can be used for general intelligence?
What can a benchmark compressor be used for?
What has a close connection to machine equivalence?

plausible_answers.text: a system that predicts the posterior probabilities of a sequence given its entire history

qas.question: What can be used for optimal justification?

plausible_answers.text: by finding the symbol that compresses best

qas.question: How is an arithmetic compressor used for prediction?

context: There is a close connection between machine learning and <a0_0><b5_0>compression<b5_0/><a0_0/>: <b6_0>a system that predicts the posterior probabilities of a sequence given its entire history<b6_0/> can be used for <b3_0>optimal<b3_0/> data compression (by using arithmetic coding on the output distribution) while an <a1_0>optimal<a1_0/> compressor can be used for <b4_0>prediction<b4_0/> (<b7_0>by finding the symbol that compresses best<b7_0/>, given the previous history). This equivalence has been used as a justification for using <a2_0>data compression<a2_0/> as a benchmark for "general intelligence."
